blogPost.excerpt: enjoy flying drones with spotfindr 🔎 find amazing spots all over the world 🚦 get drone regulations for every spot ☁️ live weather data for every spot 📍 get drone regulations for your current location
blogPost.body: enjoy flying drones with spotfindr 🔎 find amazing spots all over the world 🚦 get drone regulations for every spot ☁️ live weather data for every spot 📍 get drone regulations for your current location
blogPost.title: spotfindr 2.0 - Discover thousands of amazing drone spots around the globe
blogPost.author: Michael Hitzker

localize.description: 享受飞行无人机与spotfindr 🔎发现世界各地的惊人地点🚦获得每个地点的无人机规定☁️每个地点的实时天气数据📍获得你当前位置的无人机规定。
localize.tagline: 发现全球数千处令人惊叹的无人机景点

localize.description: 享受飛行無人機與spotfindr 🔎發現世界各地的驚人地點🚦獲得每個地點的無人機規定☁️每個地點的實時天氣數據📍獲得你當前位置的無人機規定。
localize.tagline: 發現全球數千處令人驚歎的無人機景點

previous.excerpt: WeHatePasswords is a Google Chrome extension that replaces all password fields with easy to remember pixel art. Gone are the days of remembering complicated passwords. Simply draw to log in. Compatible with password managers.
previous.title: WeHatePasswords 2.0 - You hate passwords. That's where we come in.

localize.description: WeHatePasswords是一款谷歌浏览器扩展，它可以用易于记忆的像素艺术取代所有密码字段。记住复杂密码的日子已经一去不复返了。只需画出密码即可登录。与密码管理器兼容。
localize.tagline: 你讨厌密码 这就是我们的优势所在。

localize.description: WeHatePasswords是一款谷歌瀏覽器擴展，它可以用易於記憶的像素藝術取代所有密碼字段。記住複雜密碼的日子已經一去不復返了。只需畫出密碼即可登錄。與密碼管理器兼容。
localize.tagline: 你討厭密碼 這就是我們的優勢所在。

next.excerpt: A very simple font game for designers. Inspired by https://cantunsee.space/ 🐛 This is the beta version. Any suggestions are welcome like bugs, feedback, domain name, etc.
next.title: Foont - A game for designers to identify fonts

localize.description: 一个非常简单的设计师的字体游戏。灵感来自https://cantunsee.space/ 🐛 这是测试版。欢迎提出任何建议，如bug、反馈、域名等。
localize.tagline: 设计师识别字体的游戏

localize.description: 一個非常簡單的設計師的字體遊戲。靈感來自https://cantunsee.space/ 🐛 這是測試版。歡迎提出任何建議，如bug、反饋、域名等。
localize.tagline: 設計師識別字體的遊戲
